## Web resources

[R Libguide \@ GW Libraries](https://libguides.gwu.edu/RStats){target="_blank"} - Dan's curated link of only the best R sites and resources

## R Workshops:

[Coding Workshops \@ GW Libraries](https://library.gwu.edu/events?field_tags[314]=314){target="_blank"}

## Individualized consultations:

[Coding Consultations](https://calendly.com/gwul-coding){target="_blank"} with a software developer librarian skilled in R or Python programming.

[Data consultations](http://go.gwu.edu/dataconsulting){target="_blank"} with graduate students in Academic Commons who are skilled in statistics and statistical analysis using R, Python, SAS, SPSS, STATA, and Excel.

## Community

[GW Coders](https://gwcoders.github.io/studyGroup/){target="_blank"} - Bi-weekly presentations (often with free pizza!) and a super useful Slack community. Open to anyone at GW interested in learning about coding.
